Login.invalidCredentials: Invalid credentials provided. Please check your email and password.
Login.error: An error occurred while logging in the user.

Register.name: Name
Register.nameInvalid: Name can only contain letters, spaces, hyphens, or apostrophes.
Register.passwordUppercase: Password must include at least one uppercase letter.
Register.passwordNumber: Password must include at least one number.
Register.fieldsRequired: Name, email and password are required.
Register.successfulAccountCreation: Your account has been successfully created! Welcome!
Register.error: An error occurred while registering the user.

Items.ez_barbell_desc: Curved barbell for arm workouts. Perfect for biceps and triceps.
Items.dumbbells_set_desc: A collection of free weights that allow you to perform a variety of strength exercises.
Items.kettlebell_desc: A fitness tool ideal for functional and strength training.
Items.triceps_row_desc: A fitness attachment made of a variable-length rope.
Items.angle_bar_desc: A versatile fitness tool, typically attached to a cable machine.
Items.lat_machine_bar_desc: The lat machine bar is an essential fitness tool for those looking to train their back.
Items.pull_up_bar_desc: The pull-up bar is a fitness tool consisting of a horizontal bar fixed to a support.
Items.jumping_rope_desc: Consists of a rope with handles that is rotated under the feet.
Items.weight_disc_desc: Metal or rubber cylinders with a central hole that allows them to be attached to barbells.
